projects.title: Bin Momen – Home Devices eCommerce Website
projects.description: Custom WooCommerce solution with SA States and Cities integration and AC installation services addon.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive e-commerce platform for home devices with custom WooCommerce functionality including Saudi Arabia states and cities integration, and a specialized AC installation services addon for enhanced customer experience. The website features a complete Arabic e-commerce experience with custom plugins for Saudi Arabia location management and AC installation service booking.
features: Custom SA States and Cities Plugin
solutions: Custom plugin development for SA states/cities

projects.title: FastFWD – Logistics Services Platform
projects.description: ACF integration with WooCommerce for advanced order data management in logistics platform.
projects.longDescription: Developed custom ACF (Advanced Custom Fields) integration with WooCommerce for FastFWD's logistics platform to enhance order data management. The integration provides advanced custom fields for logistics-specific data, improved order tracking, and streamlined workflow management for the global freight forwarding and supply chain solutions platform.
solutions: Advanced ACF integration for logistics data

projects.title: Stily – Car Care Booking Platform
projects.description: Designed and developed WordPress website with WooCommerce booking system for car care service appointments.
projects.longDescription: Designed and developed a responsive WordPress website with WooCommerce integration for car care service appointments. The platform features a custom WooCommerce booking system with multi-step booking interface, real-time availability, and service customization, providing customers with a seamless car care service booking experience.

projects.title: Don Digital Tech – Technology Solutions Portfolio
projects.description: WordPress portfolio website showcasing market presence across diverse sectors with international partnerships in US, Europe, and Saudi Arabia.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive WordPress portfolio website showcasing DON Technology's market presence characterized by diverse sectors with keen focus on technology solutions in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The platform highlights international partnerships with US, Europe, and Saudi Arabia, featuring solutions across logistics, oil & gas, security & defense, culture & tourism, and information technology sectors aligned with Vision 2030.

projects.title: Diamond Cover Egypt – Car Service Booking Plugin
projects.description: Developed full website with custom car service booking plugin featuring WhatsApp integration.
projects.longDescription: Developed the complete Diamond Cover Egypt website with a custom WordPress booking plugin for car services. The plugin features advanced car details management, WhatsApp integration, dynamic booking system with time slots, and comprehensive service management including paint protection, glass protection, thermal insulation, nano ceramic, and polishing services.

projects.title: SealyMe Middle East – Serial Number Verification Plugin
projects.description: Developed custom plugin for serial number verification system with warranty registration.
projects.longDescription: Developed a comprehensive WordPress website with a custom plugin for serial number verification and warranty registration system. The plugin provides secure product authentication, warranty card registration, and verification services for SealyMe's mattress products in the Middle East market, featuring advanced admin management and customer verification interfaces.

projects.title: Restaurant Reservation Platform – ITI Graduation Project
projects.description: Full-stack restaurant reservation system with Angular frontend and Laravel backend.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive restaurant reservation platform developed as an ITI graduation project, featuring a modern Angular frontend and a robust Laravel backend. The system includes table reservation management, menu management, user authentication, and admin dashboard with real-time booking capabilities.

projects.title: Goodreads Library – Angular & NodeJS
projects.description: Library management system built with Angular frontend and NodeJS backend in 2 weeks.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive library management system inspired by Goodreads, featuring book management, user reviews, and reading lists. Built with Angular for the frontend and NodeJS with MongoDB for the backend, completed in 2 weeks with a team of 2 developers.

projects.title: Simple Todo App – Angular
projects.description: Simple todo application built with Angular featuring task management and user data fetching.
projects.longDescription: A clean and simple todo application built with Angular framework, featuring task management functionality, user data fetching, and intuitive task creation and management. The app demonstrates Angular fundamentals with a focus on user experience and data handling.

projects.title: Simple Portfolio Website – Angular
projects.description: Simple personal portfolio website built with Angular framework showcasing skills and projects.
projects.longDescription: A clean and simple personal portfolio website built with Angular framework, featuring skills showcase, project display, and professional presentation. The portfolio demonstrates Angular fundamentals with a focus on clean design and user experience, showcasing front-end development expertise including React, Angular, Node.js, and WordPress technologies.

projects.title: Frontend E-commerce Project – ReactJS
projects.description: Modern eCommerce frontend built with ReactJS and modern web technologies.
projects.longDescription: A modern eCommerce frontend application built with ReactJS, featuring product browsing, shopping cart functionality, and user interface design. The project demonstrates modern React development practices and responsive design.

projects.title: Pure Vanilla eCommerce Website
projects.description: E-commerce website built with pure vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
projects.longDescription: A complete eCommerce website built using only vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS without any frameworks. The project demonstrates fundamental web development skills and modern JavaScript practices.

projects.title: Smart Wearable Glass for Autistic Kids – Graduation Project
projects.description: Innovative wearable technology with sensors for real-time health monitoring and educational support.
projects.longDescription: A groundbreaking graduation project featuring smart wearable glasses designed specifically for autistic children. The system includes sensors for real-time health monitoring, educational support features, and companion mobile app and website for comprehensive care management.

projects.title: SealyMe Mattresses Website – UI Design
projects.description: Complete UI redesign for SealyMe mattresses website including home, shop, and single product pages.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive UI design project for SealyMe mattresses website redesign, featuring modern and user-friendly interfaces for home page, shop page, and single product page. The design focuses on enhancing user experience, improving product presentation, and creating an intuitive e-commerce interface for mattress products.

projects.title: Sealy Middle East – Product Card Design
projects.description: Modern product card design for Sealy Middle East mattress shop with enhanced visual appeal and user experience.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive product card design project for Sealy Middle East mattress shop, featuring modern and attractive product card layouts that enhance product presentation, improve user engagement, and create an intuitive shopping experience. The design focuses on showcasing mattress features, pricing, and call-to-action elements in an aesthetically pleasing and conversion-optimized format.
